snippet.title: Rare Revealed: A Rare Look at Dream
snippet.description:
You never thought you'd see the day. But as we spelunked through the archives for Rare Replay material, it resurfaced after all this time. And here it is: unspoiled footage of Dream, the adventure of boy hero Edson and his dog Dinger. The fabled precursor to Banjo-Kazooie. Including new interview footage with Dream and Banjo-Kazooie team members. Enjoy!

To follow the story into the full making of Banjo-Kazooie, pick up Rare Replay for Xbox One and check out the Rare Revealed bonus features...

Get Rare Replay for more: https://store.xbox.com/Xbox-One/Bundle/Rare-Replay/bc5c9721-2752-489e-851a-aa2aa039a23c
Talk to us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/RareLtd
Find us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/RareLtd
Inspire us on Instagram: https://instagram.com/rareltd/
